title: The Hormone Cure
content:
Preventing and treating hormonal imbalances, with Dr. Sara Gottfried. Dr. <!--more--> Sara Gottfried is a Harvard trained medical physician and gynocologist, yoga teacher and founder of the Gottfried Institute in Berkeley California.  She has been practicing complementary medicine for over 20 years and has specialized in preventing and treating hormonal imbalances and disorders that have reached epidemic proportions among men and women alike.
  Through natural treatments and rigorous scientific testing, her institute has now treated over 10,000 women during the past ten years.
She is the author of “The Hormone Cure: Reclaim Balance, Sleep, Sex Drive and Vitality Naturally” www.SaraGottfriedMD.com
